title: Generative AI-Enhanced Self-Directed Mathematics Learning Design for Improved Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic usage of generative AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT)
context.additional_context: Program aimed at improving work-integrated mathematical problem-solving skills for professional learners (medical/legal/technical); establishing generative AI-integrated learning environments using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more creative approaches to mathematical problem-solving using generative AI.
Learners develop strategies to enhance academic engagement (cognitive and emotional immersion) by over 20% when using generative AI.
Learners identify over 80% of the educational utility of feedback provided by generative AI in a "high-challenge, high-support" learning environment.

resources: Digital content library for math education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
